statements: SELECT * FROM tax_compliance_regulations ORDER BY regulation_name ASC
SELECT regulation_name, update_date FROM tax_compliance_regulations
SELECT * FROM tax_compliance_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 3
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name FROM tax_compliance_regulations ORDER BY update_date DESC
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM tax_compliance_regulations
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM tax_compliance_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tax_compliance_regulations WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name FROM tax_compliance_regulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE '%audit%';
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_description FROM tax_compliance_regulations ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_regulations FROM tax_compliance_regulations;
SELECT * FROM tax_regulations ORDER BY country_code ASC;
SELECT id, regulation_text FROM tax_regulations WHERE country_code = 'US';
SELECT regulation_text FROM tax_regulations WHERE last_updated >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT update_text FROM tax_updates WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM tax_regulations WHERE country_code IN ('US', 'CA') ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_regulations WHERE country_code = 'US';
SELECT regulation_text FROM tax_regulations WHERE id = 25;
SELECT regulation_text, last_updated FROM tax_regulations WHERE country_code = 'CA' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT tax_regulations.country_code, tax_updates.update_text FROM tax_regulations JOIN tax_updates ON tax_regulations.id = tax_updates.regulation_id WHERE tax_regulations.country_code = 'DE';
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_last_updated FROM tax_compliance_regulations;
SELECT * FROM tax_compliance_regulations WHERE regulation_last_updated > '2021-01-01';
SELECT country_name, tax_rate FROM country_tax_rates WHERE tax_rate >= 15.00;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM tax_compliance_regulations ORDER BY regulation_last_updated DESC;
SELECT country_name, tax_category FROM country_tax_rates WHERE tax_category = 'Income Tax';
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name FROM tax_compliance_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description, regulation_last_updated FROM tax_compliance_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM country_tax_rates ORDER BY country_name ASC;
SELECT country_name, tax_rate FROM country_tax_rates WHERE tax_category = 'Income Tax';
SELECT * FROM tax_reporting_history WHERE reported_amount > 1000 ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM tax_regulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, agency_name, contact_person FROM authority_agency ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM updates_log WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulation_name, status, review_date FROM tax_regulations JOIN compliance_status ON tax_regulations.id = compliance_status.regulation_id;
SELECT * FROM tax_regulations
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM tax_regulations WHERE last_updated > '2021-01-01'

SELECT compliance_status.status, compliance_status.review_date, authority_agency.agency_name FROM compliance_status INNER JOIN authority_agency ON compliance_status.regulation_id = authority_agency.id
SELECT * FROM updates_log WHERE update_type = 'Major Update' ORDER BY update_date DESC

SELECT authority_agency.agency_name, authority_agency.contact_person, compliance_status.status, compliance_status.review_date FROM authority_agency LEFT JOIN compliance_status ON authority_agency.id = compliance_status.regulation_id
SELECT * FROM tax_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, publication_date FROM tax_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT description FROM tax_categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT regulation_id, update_date, update_description FROM regulation_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulation_references WHERE regulation_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM tax_regulations;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name FROM tax_categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT regulation_id, publication_date, description FROM tax_regulations ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT u.update_id, u.update_date, r.regulation_name FROM regulation_updates u LEFT JOIN tax_regulations r ON u.regulation_id = r.regulation_id;

SELECT r.regulation_name, COUNT(h.history_id) AS update_count FROM tax_regulations r LEFT JOIN regulation_updates u ON r.regulation_id = u.regulation_id LEFT JOIN update_history h ON u.update_id = h.update_id GROUP BY r.regulation_name HAVING COUNT(h.history_id) > 5;
